original_text:
He hurls down his crystals of ice like crumbs;
    who can stand before his cold?
korean_text: 우박을 떡 부스러기 같이 뿌리시나니 누가 능히 그의 추위를 감당하리요

sentences.original_text: He hurls down his crystals of ice like crumbs
who can stand before his cold?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그의 추위를 견딜 수 있겠는가?
